education.summary:
Currently undergoing a mentorship program in black valley, where i have learned how to create inter-personal relationships and also grow my network.

	•

Participated in the annual Bootcamp for web developers and made it to the final and project phase out of 2000 participants:

	• Worked with the design and front-end team to build a web application called Myhelperng where individuals, NGOs, and volunteers can register. The individuals can raise issues affecting their communities, so the volunteers or organizations can help with the issue raised
	• Developed the architecture for the backend with my backend teammates with expressjs and MongoDB
	•  Personally worked on the volunteer route, model, controllers, tested the route with the postman and populated the database with relevant information

education.degree: HND. in Estate Mangement And Valuation

work.summary:
• Built and managed a web application for a Real estate firm which attracted new clients and also increased the number of properties they sold. 
• Currently redesigning  our main website.

• Gained hand on experience by collaborating with the design, marketing, and backend team in developing various web applications for different clients. 
• Designed, developed and maintained the front-end application for the company's project using ReactJS. 
• Also gained valuable teamwork, communication, and problem-solving skills. 
• Designed the Homepage, register and Login Pages for an Event sign-up Company
• Maintained and monitored computer system software, Diagnosed and solved system software and hardware faults,Installing and configuring system software and hardware .

hacker-news.name: Hacker News
hacker-news.description: For this project, I used the hacker-news API, where users can fetch a story based on their search input, users can remove storis they are not interested in or read the one they are interested in .

movie-DB.name: Movie DB
movie-DB.description: For this project, I used the public OMDB API , where users can search for movies and also view informations about a single movie.

stock-photos.name: Stock Photos
stock-photos.description: Unsplash is website where photograhies showcase the photograhy skills and also upload photos in high-quality. I made use of their APi to design a website where users can search for photos.  .

cocktails.name: Cocktails
cocktails.description: For this project i made use of an API to fetch drinks, and user can fetch drinks based on their name amd information .

quiz-app.name: Quiz App
quiz-app.description: Made us of open trivia DB API to design a trivia game, users can chose from three categories namely, sports, history and politics, the can also select difficulty level.

faq.name: Ecommerce Faq
faq.description: Frequently Asked Question (FAQ) designed with alan AI and chakra UI, with voice assist, designed becasue I was curious on how  AI works.

Quotes-Generator.name: quotes-generator
Quotes-Generator.description:
My very first project where i worked withan Api, where users can generate random quote , and also can tweet it , if tgey chose to do so.

Built using Reactjs and CSS.

git-users.name: Github User
git-users.description: Made use of the github APi to fetch github users, in this project i made use of Auth0 authentucation, so a user can sign up before they can be able to view the Homepage

background-generator.name: Background-generator
background-generator.description: A simple background generator designed with vanilla JavaScript.

Todo-App.name: Todo
Todo-App.description: This has to be here , my very first vanilla Javascript project, just a simple todo app, where you can a todo, mark if its done or remove it, ps: dont mind the color, i was trying to be fancy with it.

Myhelperng.name: myhelperng
Myhelperng.description: This was my final in Zuri & I4G bootcamp, we had a team of 25 members, PM, supervisor, Design, FE and BE, i worked with backend team where we create the architecture using express.js and mongoDB, an i worked the volunteer sign up. The project is meant NGOs, and volunteers , where individuals register and raise issues regarding their community and the volunteers and NGO can pick those issues and render help.
